prompt: What are some good real-time translation software options?

hidden_queries: best real time translation tools live translation software

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are solid real-time translation software options (voice/text/live meetings), grouped by common use cases: 1) General-Purpose Real-Time Translators Google Translate – voice/text conversation mode with very broad language support and free; mobile and web. ScreenApp
Microsoft Translator – live conversation mode and multi-device chat; integrates with Teams/Office tools. Strikingly

sources.title: Google Meet gets real-time live translation capabilities; here's how it works
sources.snippet: Google has introduced real-time live translation capabilities in Google Meet, powered by its advanced Gemini AI, as announced at Google I/O 2025. This new feature allows spoken language during video calls to be translated in real time into a conversation partner’s preferred language. A key highlight of the service is its ability to preserve the speaker's original voice, tone, and emotional inflection, enhancing the authenticity and clarity of communication. During a demonstration at the event, CEO Sundar Pichai showcased a conversation between an English and a Spanish speaker, with seamless, voice-matched translations provided by AI. This enhancement positions Google Meet competitively, following Microsoft Teams which launched a preview of a similar AI translation feature earlier in the year. The article also hints at further details regarding functionality and availability.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Google Meet (built-in) – real-time voice translation in calls via AI. The Times of India

sources.title: These $140 earbuds translate 50+ languages while you listen
sources.snippet: The Mymanu Orb Open-Ear AI Translation Earbuds, showcased at CES 2026, offer users a unique blend of audio entertainment, real-world awareness, and advanced language translation technology. Priced at $139.99 (down from a $179.99 MSRP), these earbuds feature an open-ear design that allows users to hear their surroundings while simultaneously listening to music, taking calls, or translating real-time conversations. The standout feature is their built-in AI, which supports translation in over 50 languages across live conversations, phone calls, and spoken audio—ideal for travel, work, or multilingual environments. Beyond translation, the earbuds function as typical audio accessories with a sleek, lightweight, and water-resistant design. With up to 35 hours of battery life using the charging case and hands-free controls, they offer a user-friendly and futuristic audio solution without added complexity.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Wearable earbuds/devices – e.g., AI translation earbuds that deliver live speech translations (50+ languages). SFGATE
